data.message: Btw,Good call on signing Yelawolf.I had heard Til its Gone awhile back and immediately liked it,also its my song to my "not" so young anymore Boy,who is also a fan,well..bout burnt him out on MM2,but its ok,paybacks a bitch,take it back to  99,lmao..Anyway,totally dig Love Story,and Best Friend,right on..got the Cd soon as I heard it.I will be watching and listening,oh,and Thank You,..I've always loved writing n rhyming,but I realized that's me,who the hell knew..I know,you wont see this,but oh well,if so great😊 #544evayoung😎
